original_text:
While Israel was living in that region, Reuben went in and slept with his father’s concubine Bilhah, and Israel heard of it.
Jacob had twelve sons:
korean_text: 이스라엘이 그 땅에 거주할 때에 르우벤이 가서 그 아버지의 첩 빌하와 동침하매 이스라엘이 이를 들었더라

sentences.original_text: While Israel was living in that region
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘이 그 지역에 살고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: and slept with his father's concubine Bilhah
